languages.text: {n}Прежде чем вы успеваете убрать его, мешочек рассыпается и бесцветной трухой опадает на Арену, процеживаясь сквозь ваши пальцы. Сила, что таилась в нем, иссякла навеки, так и не исполнив своего предназначения.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can put the bag away, it falls apart and seeps through your fingers to the arena floor in a pile of colourless flakes. The power that was hidden within is gone forever, its purpose unfulfilled.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Before you can put the bag away, it falls apart and seeps through your fingers to the arena floor in a pile of colourless flakes. The power that was hidden within is gone forever, its purpose unfulfilled.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Прежде чем вы успеваете убрать его, мешочек рассыпается и бесцветной трухой опадает на Арену, процеживаясь сквозь ваши пальцы. Сила, что таилась в нем, иссякла навеки, так и не исполнив своего предназначения.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous n'avez pas le temps de poser le sac qu'il se désintègre et glisse entre vos doigts, formant une petite pile de flocons incolores sur le sol de l'arène. Le pouvoir qu'il contenait s'est évanoui à jamais, sans avoir atteint son but.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can put the bag away, it falls apart and seeps through your fingers to the arena floor in a pile of colourless flakes. The power that was hidden within is gone forever, its purpose unfulfilled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous n'avez pas le temps de poser le sac qu'il se désintègre et glisse entre vos doigts, formant une petite pile de flocons incolores sur le sol de l'arène. Le pouvoir qu'il contenait s'est évanoui à jamais, sans avoir atteint son but.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你还没来得及把袋子收起来，它就破了，里面的魔尘从指间渗到地上，变成了一堆无色的碎片。隐藏在魔尘中的力量未能实现原本的目的，彻底消失不见了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can put the bag away, it falls apart and seeps through your fingers to the arena floor in a pile of colourless flakes. The power that was hidden within is gone forever, its purpose unfulfilled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你还没来得及把袋子收起来，它就破了，里面的魔尘从指间渗到地上，变成了一堆无色的碎片。隐藏在魔尘中的力量未能实现原本的目的，彻底消失不见了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}袋は、しまう前に散り散りになり、あなたの指からアリーナの床へと落ちて無色の薄片の山となった。その中に隠されていた力は永遠に消え去り、その目的は果たされなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can put the bag away, it falls apart and seeps through your fingers to the arena floor in a pile of colourless flakes. The power that was hidden within is gone forever, its purpose unfulfilled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}袋は、しまう前に散り散りになり、あなたの指からアリーナの床へと落ちて無色の薄片の山となった。その中に隠されていた力は永遠に消え去り、その目的は果たされなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bevor du den Beutel wieder verstauen kannst, löst er sich auf und rinnt dir wie farblose Flocken durch die Finger in Richtung Arenaboden. Die in ihm verborgene Kraft ist für immer verschwunden, ihr Zweck bleibt unerfüllt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can put the bag away, it falls apart and seeps through your fingers to the arena floor in a pile of colourless flakes. The power that was hidden within is gone forever, its purpose unfulfilled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bevor du den Beutel wieder verstauen kannst, löst er sich auf und rinnt dir wie farblose Flocken durch die Finger in Richtung Arenaboden. Die in ihm verborgene Kraft ist für immer verschwunden, ihr Zweck bleibt unerfüllt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Antes de que puedas guardar la bolsa, esta se deshace y el contenido se escurre entre tus dedos, cayendo al suelo de la arena como un montón de copos descoloridos. El poder que encerraban se ha perdido para siempre sin completar su propósito.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can put the bag away, it falls apart and seeps through your fingers to the arena floor in a pile of colourless flakes. The power that was hidden within is gone forever, its purpose unfulfilled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Antes de que puedas guardar la bolsa, esta se deshace y el contenido se escurre entre tus dedos, cayendo al suelo de la arena como un montón de copos descoloridos. El poder que encerraban se ha perdido para siempre sin completar su propósito.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kese, sen onu kaldırıp saklayamadan dağılıyor ve parmaklarının arasından kayarak arena zeminiyle buluşuyor. Yerde renksiz pullardan oluşan bir yığın oluşuyor. Kesenin içindeki güç, asla gerçekleştiremeyeceği amacıyla birlikte yitip gidiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can put the bag away, it falls apart and seeps through your fingers to the arena floor in a pile of colourless flakes. The power that was hidden within is gone forever, its purpose unfulfilled.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kese, sen onu kaldırıp saklayamadan dağılıyor ve parmaklarının arasından kayarak arena zeminiyle buluşuyor. Yerde renksiz pullardan oluşan bir yığın oluşuyor. Kesenin içindeki güç, asla gerçekleştiremeyeceği amacıyla birlikte yitip gidiyor.{/n}
